item.title: Academic Representative
item.description: Why I became a year representative? “I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.” — Stephen R. Covey (Author of The 7 Habits of […], a classic book much less cheesy than its title) Our university experience depends on us just as much as on our lecturers and professors. Imperial is a top-of-the-world university because exceptional researchers meet exceptional students. This synergy needs a well functional feedback loop, and that is my job as your Year Academic Representative.

item.title: Curriculum Vitæ
item.description: Printable CV For printing, please use the pdf version of my CV. Work Experience Power Engineering Internship @ Rolls-Royce plc Derby, UK | Jun 2018 - Aug 2018 Intern to be trough the IET Power Academy programme. Web development Internship @ Promiseo s.r.o. Kosice, SK | Jul 2017 - Sep 2017 Tasks and responsibilities Transcription of Photoshop designs to HTML, CSS, JS Coding of email newsletters Configuring Wordpress sites Skills enhanced Front-end workflow HTML, CSS (SCSS) Javascript & JQuery Wordpress Education Imperial College London MEng Electronic and Information Engineering

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email I answer all of them. Personal 1 adamurban98@gmail.com Personal 2 adam@adamurban.net Academic adam.urban17@imperial.ac.uk Professional LinkedIn My full CV site Single page printable CV Social media I only use Facebook. Occasionally Instagram, but only for stalking.

item.title: Mastermind
item.description: Technical notes This document is intended as a suplementary description of my solution to the 3rd assignment of module Introduction to Computing at Imperial College London. When dealing with code, C++ is assumed and used, unless stated othwerwise. C++11 features are used. Mastermind rules In the beginning the code maker generates a valid code, which will be refered to as codeword. A valid code is any arbitrary sequence of $n$ non-negative integers - colours -, each from the range $[0,k)$.

item.title: EIE DepRep 2018 campaign
item.description: Dear Fellow EIE students at Imperial College London, I am announcing that I am running for the position of Departmental Representative of EIE in the Leadership election of Imperial College Student’s Union 2018. What I want to accomplish More Internships for EIE Closer ties to DoCSoc A clear direction for EIE How I want to accomplish these goals? 1. More Internships for EIE The problem is that Internships are hard to get for people from EEE in general.
